> It just so happens that we get all the per-country pages, because
> they're linked elsewhere, but we could easily miss such material
> on other sites.

This happens a lot.  But this is a phenomenon
of broad crawling and perhaps won't save us during with our more
depth-first policy.  At the same time, I'd still put it on the list
of "things we might someday do" and wait until a "customer" has
an actual problem.
